translation.fr: Étais-tu juste un peu vilain la nuit dernière ?

translation.en: Mm, I... In a nice way.
That's why I love you.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que je t'aime.

translation.en: Do you want to watch a movie?
It's a Wonderful Life?
White Christmas?
The Grinch!
Well, actually...
I had something else in mind.
Something... really cool.
